name: thinbus-srp
description: Secure Remote Password SRP SRP6a implementation.

scripts.build-nocrypto: browserify -r random-strings > random-strings-out.js; browserify -r crypto-js/sha256 > sha256-out.js; browserify -r jsbn > jsbn-out.js; browserify --full-paths --no-bundle-external -x jsbn -x crypto-js/sha256 -r ./client.js  -o browser-out.js
